name: Penguin Palooza
description: 2D Battle Arena made in 48 hours for the Home of Nerds Game Jam, with the theme of dying is good! You are a penguin, shooting down flying fish with snowballs to collect them! But to get those fish for sure, you must first be hit by your opponent. Be warned, however, that if you hit your opponent, they gain their points for good, and you lose your stack!
